::Epyon::

He was still watching WWF. It was timr for the main event, and as soon
as Stone Cold Steve Austin's music hit, the transmission was interupted.
The IGL message played. A smile came across Epyon's face. This was
interesting. He set the comp he had been watching to communication mode.
It recorded a message and sent it.
"This is Captain Epyon. I am from Iron Raptor's Maximal group. I would
like to enter into your regular competition." The message was relayed
over and over back to the IGL ship.

Epyon thinks for a sec, and then opens a comm to Hot Rod.
"Hey Hot Rod, come to my location. There is something you might be
interested in seeing."

::Hot Rod::

"Epyon, I'm kinda in a training session right now."

"It will just take a few minutes," Epyon says.

"Ok, Ok. I'll be there in a minute." Hot Rod turns to Iron Raptor.
"Please excuse me." He walks out and follows the signal from Epyon, and
heads to the room.
